flavor: "Jasne, że Anderson to straszna żyła. Zawsze konfiskuje rum i nie robi postojów, aż do zmierzchu. Ale tutaj, w środku pustkowia, zdecydowanie cieszę się, że to on prowadzi."
name: Inspirująca obecność
text: Jeśli ten test umiejętności zakończy się sukcesem, przygotuj dowolny atut z cechą [[Sprzymierzeniec]] w twojej lokalizacji i wylecz z niego 1 obrażenie albo 1 punkt przerażenia.

name: Mano a Mano
text:
Zagraj tylko jako twoją pierwszą akcję.
Zadaj 1 obrażenie wrogowi, który jest z tobą w zwarciu. Ta akcja nie wywołuje ataków towarzyszących.

name: Pierwsza pomoc
text:
Zużywalny (4 zasoby). Kiedy na Pierwszej pomocy nie ma zasobów, odrzuć ją. 
[action] Wydaj 1 zasób: Wylecz 1 obrażenie i 1 punkt przerażenia z badacza lub atutu z cechą [[Sprzymierzeniec]] w twojej lokalizacji.

name: Eureka!
text: If this skill test is successful, the investigator performing this test searches the top 3 cards of his or her deck for a card, draws it, and shuffles his or her deck.

flavor: You know this town like the back of your hand.
name: Shortcut
text: Fast. Play only during your turn. Attach to your location. Attached location gains: "[free] Exhaust Shortcut: Move (to a connecting location)."

name: "Watch this!"
text:
Commit only to a skill test you are performing. As an additional cost to commit "Watch this!" to a skill test, spend up to 3 resources.
If you succeed by 1 or more, gain twice that many resources.

name: .41 Derringer
text: Uses (3 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack. If you succeed by 1 or more, this attack deals +1 damage. Once per turn, if you succeed by 3 or more, you may take an additional action this turn.

name: Torrent of Power
text:
As an additional cost to commit Torrent of Power to a skill test, spend up to 3 charges from among assets you control.
For each charge spent in this way, Torrent of Power gains [willpower] [wild].

name: Scrying
text:
Uses (3 charges).
[free] Exhaust Scrying and spend 1 charge: Look at the top 3 cards of any investigator's deck, or the encounter deck. Return them to the top of that deck, in any order. If a [[Terror]] or [[Omen]] card is among the looked-at cards, take 1 horror.

flavor: "Is… is it over?" Her hands shook, and she fell to her knees. "Is it finally over?"
name: Waylay
text: Choose an exhausted non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location and test [agility] (X), where X is that enemy's evade value. If you succeed, defeat that enemy.

name: A Chance Encounter
text: Choose an [[Ally]] asset with printed resource cost X in any player's discard pile. Put that asset into play under your control.

flavor: You can never be too prepared.
name: Emergency Cache
text: Gain 4 resources or place 4 supply tokens among assets controlled by investigators at your location, or any combination thereof.
